titleStmt.title: SII 4.445: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 445. (A.R. No. 44 of 1891). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE FIRST PRAKARA OF THE APATSAHAYESVARA TEMPLE AT ALANGUDI NEAR NIDAMANGALAM, PAPANASAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī .. pukaḻ cūḻnta puṇari Akaḻ cūḻnta puviyil poṉṉe
mi Aḷavun taṉnemi naṭappa viḷaṅku jayamakaḷai Iḷaṅkopparuvattuc cak
karakoṭṭattu vikkiramattoḻilāl putumaṇam puṇarn=tu matuvaraiyīṭṭam vayirā
karattu vāri Ayirmuṉaik koṉtaḷavaraicar taṉ taḷamiriya vāḷuṟai kaḻittut toḷvali kāṭ
ṭi peoṟpari ṉaṭātti kirttiyai ṉiṟutti vaṭaticai vākai cūṭi teṉ ticai temarukama
lap pūmakaḷ potumaiyum poṉṉi yāṭaiyum ṉaṉṉilappāvaiyum taṉimaiyum
tavirap puṉitaṟ tirumaṇi makuṭam Urimaiyiṟcūṭitaṉṉaṭi yiraṇṭum taṭamuṭiĀkat tonnilave
ntar cūṭa munnai manuvāṟu peruka kaliyāṟu vaṟuppac ceṅkol ticaitoṟum cella veṇkuṭai yirunila
viḷākam Eṅkaṇun tantu tirunila veṇṇilāt tikaḻa Orutani meruvil puli viḷaiyāṭa vārkaṭaṟ ṟivān=tarattup pūpā
lar tiṟai viṭutta kalañcori kaḷuṟu muṟai niṟpa vilaṅkiya teṉṉavan karun=talai parun talaittiṭat taṉ poṉṉakarppuṟatti
ṭaik kiṭappa Iṉṉāḷ piṟkulapiṟaipol niṟpiḻai Eṉṉuñ colletirkoṭiṟṟallatu tankai villetir ko
ṭā veḻkulattaraiyāḷt tiypaṭṭa kaḷuṟṟin tīṭṭamum paṭṭa veṅkariyum viṭṭa taṉ mānamuṅ kūṟiṉa vīramu
ṅ kiṭappa Eṟiṉa malaikaḷu mutuku neḷippa Iḻin=ta natikaḷuñ cuḻaṉ ṟuṭaintoṭa viḻun=takaṭalkaḷun=talaivi
rit talamara kuṭaticaittaṉṉāḷukan=tu tātun=tātaiyum pannāḷiṭṭap palapala mutukum payattetir māṟiya cayapperu n=ti
ruvum paḻi Ikaḻn=tu ku ṭutta pukaḻuñcelviyum vāḷāroṇkaṇ maṭan=taaiya rīṭṭamum miḷātu kuṭutta veṅkari niraiyum kaṅkamaṇ
ṭalamumñ ciṅkaṇameṉṉum pāṇiyiraṇṭum Oru vicaik kaikkoṇ ṭīṇṭiya pukaḻoṭu pāṇṭimaṇṭalaṅ koḷaḷat
tiruvuḷḷattaṭaittu veḷḷalar paritturaṅkamum poruparit turaṅkamumpolat tan=tira vāriyu muṭaittāy van=tu
l teṉkaṭal paṭarvatupolat taṉperuñ cenaiyaiy Evip pañcavaraivarum poruta poṟkaḷat tañci veruneḷittoṭi Ara
ṇenap pukka kāṭaṟuttu ṉāṭṭaṭippaṭuttu maṟṟavartammai vaṉacarar tiriyum poccai veñcura meṟṟi koṟṟa
vijayastaMbham ticaitoṟum ṉiṟutti muttiṉ calāpamum muttamiḻp potiyalum matta veṅkaripaṭumaiyyac
cayyamum kaṉṉiyuṅ kaikkoṇṭaruḷi tennāṭṭellai kāṭṭi kaṭalmalaināṭṭuḷḷa cāveṟelā n=tani vicumpeṟa māve
ṟiya tan marutaniṟ talaivaraik kuṟukalar kulaiyak koṭṭāṟuṭppaṭa neṟitoṟun=nilaikaḷiṭṭaruḷit tiṟalkoḷ vīrasiṁhāsanan=ti
riya viṭṭaruḷi vaṭaticai veṅkaimaṇṭalaṅ kaṭan=tu tāṅkalar kaliṅkamuṅ kanaleri parappa vilaṅkalpol vilaṅkiya ven=tar viṭ
ṭa veṅkaḷuṟoṭu paṭṭu muṉ puraḷa poru kopattoṭu pormuka matirvaru komaṭaiyan mātavanetirpaṭa Eṅkarāyaṉ Ikalavareccaṇan mā
ppiṟaḷā matakari Irācaṇan taṇṭupati Ākiya talaicceṉāpati maṇṭalika tāmaya neṇpartticaimukaṉ pottayaṉ kettaṇan ceruccenāpati Eṉ
ṟiva ranaivarum veṟṟaveḻattoṭu paṭṭu maṟṟavar karun=talaiyoṭu veṇṇiṇaṅ kaḻukoṭu parun=talai Eṅkaṇum parappa Uya
rttu karuṅkaṭa laṭaiyat tarātaram tiran=tu kaliṅkameḻuṅkaiykkoṇṭu Alaṅkalāramum tiruppuyat talaṅkalumpola
vīramu n=tiyākamum viḷaṅkap pār toḻac civaniṭat tumaiyenat tiyākavalli Ulakuṭaiyā ḷiruppa Avaḷuṭaṉ kaṅkai vī
ṟṟirun=tena maṅkaaiyar tilatam Eḻicaivallabhi Eḻulakamuṭaiyāḷ vāḻi kaimalar n=tinitiruppa Ūḻiyu n=tirumālākattup piriyāteṉ
ṟum tirumaka ḷirun=taina vīrasiṁhāsanattu vīṟṟirun=taruḷina kovirājakesaripatmarāna tribhuvanaccakravatti śrīkulot
tuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 4 10 5 Āvatu tulānāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu viyāḻakkiḻamaiyum saptamiyum peṟṟa
Uttiraāṭatti nāḷ cuttamalivaḷanāṭṭu muṭiccoṇāṭṭu brahmadeyam śrījananāthaścaturvedimaṅkalattup peruṅkuṟi
sabhaiyom nammurt tiruvirumpūḷaiuṭaiya mahādevar koyilile dharmmi ceytu peṟuṅkuṟikkūṭṭam kuṟaivaṟakkūṭi
paṇṇina vyavasthaiyāvatu Arumoḻitevavaḷanāṭṭuc ceṟṟūr kūṟṟattu Okaiyil OkaiUṭaiyār caṅ
ṉtārāṉa kāṭuveṭṭikaḷkku ṉāṅkaḷ śāśvatikamāka candrādittyavaṟ nilainiṟkak kaṭavitāka ṉāṅkaḷ Iṟaiyili
tukuṭutta paricāvatu Ivvāṇṭu Ivarpakkal koṇṭa nellu Aiyyāyirattu Irunūṟṟunāṟpatiṉkalattiṉāl vanta
paṭi kācu Oṉṟukku nellu patiṉmukkalamāka vanta kācu nānūṟṟu muṉṟe Oru māvaraiyum Eṅkaḷ Ūril naṭuviṟkoyilil
muṉpu Ukan=taruḷāmaiyil tirukkolam Eḻuntaruḷuvikka koṇṭa kācu muppatteḻum Ākakkācu nānūṟṟu nāṟpate
māvaraiyuṅ koṇṭu Ikkācukku dharmmavṛttikku celavāka Ūrile Āyirattunāṟpatiṉmaṉcālai Eṉṟu Ivarkku dharmma
māka brāhmaṇar Uṇṇaccālai
āka Iṟaiyiliceytu kuṭutta nilamāva
tu tiruvaraṅkavatikkuk kiḻakku
cuntaracoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku
ṅkaṇṇāṟṟu munṟāñ catirattu e
nilaṅ kālil kiḻkkaṭaiya nilam
mā Araikkāṇi muntirikaiyuṅ kuḻi Iraṇṭāyira
m Iṅkekiḻai Araiyil kiḻkkaṭaiya nilam
kāle Araikkāṇi muntirikaiyuṅ kuḻi muṉ
ṟaṟaiyum kon=takkamātevivatikkuk kiḻakku cu
n=taracoḻavākkālukkut teṟku Āṟāṅkaṇṇā
ṟṟu nālāñcatirattu meṟkaṭaiyan nilam Ira
ṇṭumā nikki Itaṉ kiḻakku nilam kālum tirucciṟṟa
mpalavatikkuk kiḻakku cun=taracoḻavāykkāluk
kut teṟku Eṭṭāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu mutal catirattu m
maṟkaṭaiya nilam nālumāk kāṇi nikki Ita
ṉkiḻakku nilam kālum Itaṉkiḻakku nilam mum
māvaraiyum Aṟiñciyaṉvāykkālukkut teṟku
mutaṟkaṇṇāṟṟu mutaṟ catirattu meṟkkaṭaiya nilamnā
lum Itaṉ kiḻakku nilaṅ kālil nilam nā
lu mā muntirikai ..
Digital edition of SII 4.445 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
